titleStmt.title: A just vindication of Mr. Poole's design for printing of his Synopsis of critical and other commentators; against the pretences of Mr. Cornelius Bee, book-seller
titleStmt.author: Poole, Matthew, 1624-1679.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Wing P2827: Poole, Matthew. A brief description of a design concerning a synopsis of the critical and other commentatours.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
